title: Bug affecting animation on several abillitys on several champions,
body:
Hey, ive recently come across a bug i've been experiencing in game where the animations of abillitys such as Ornns ult, Ekkos q and r (image of ekko), Jinx and aurelion sol passive has been out of place, for example
I was playing a game of ranked on ekko where this bug littearly lost me my lane because everytime i threw my q from purpleside mid tower ekko would throw the animation but then the actual q itself would teleport to the enemy tower out of place.
Similar to aurelion sols passive where there would be a brief 1 second delay before the passive actually hitting someone.
jinxs ult would generally become invisible and orrns ult animation as you can see in the video,
also when playing  the game would feel like its going in slow motion for a brief 1-3 seconds and this occurs every 1-3 mins, 

Ive tried full repairing 3 times
uninstalling and reinstalling twice
flushing the dns cache, updating my graphics card driver
setting my priority of the game to high and afflinity to cpu 1
and tried reading several other bugs, please help
for the love of god please someone help i just want to get out of plat :((
